medical-landing.banner_subtitle: Impart the compassionate love of Jesus through Healing Ministry
medical-landing.about_subtitle: Visit us at any time for diagnosis and treatment with our 24/7 department.
medical-landing.about_quote: ST. AUGUSTINE HOSPITAL, located in Chapaguri, Chirang District, Assam, India, is a vital healthcare institution dedicated to provide essential medical services to the local population, established in the year 2000, the hospital is a general facility with a capacity of 120 beds, encompassing various specialized department and services. The institution operates under the umbrella of the Augustinian sisters, a Christian religious society registered in Assam known as ”ST. Augustine Social Service Society”, with its principal office situated in Chapaguri, Bongaigaon. The hospital is equipped with a range of facilities to address the healthcare needs of the community. These include a Maternity department, Pediatric department, Medical Surgical department, Operation Theaters, Casualty, Dental Clinic, ICU, PICU and a neo natal intensive care unit (NICU). The hospital provides Cardiac, Nephrology consultation, etc twice a month. The hospital has got 24x7 Emergency services.
medical-landing.expertise_subtitle: The doctors at The Clinic are all registered on the General Medical Council.
medical-landing.expertise_paragraph: Our customer service team is always available to listen and help. If you aren't satisfied, for any reason, we'll refund your cost. Because we believe happiness is a big part of good health.
medical-landing.cta_subtitle: No waiting rooms. We make it simple to get healthcare whenever and wherever you want
medical-landing.footer_paragraph: It's not too good to be true, it's just the way healthcare should be simple.
